title: Naotora: The Lady Warlord
resume: Naotora Ii is a woman given a male name, who succeeded as the head of the Ii family during the Warring States period when her father passed away. With her wisdom, courage and affection for loved ones, Naotora lived through turbulent times and paved the way for the future of her clan.

With her wisdom, courage and affection for loved ones, Naotora lived through turbulent times and paved the way for the future of her clan.
